name: FORABOLSONARO - DARK MODE
description:
What is terror? When do you feel terrified? 
An incompetent, selfish, ignorant, arrogant, violent, dictator, childish, sexist, homophobic, racist, religious intolerant, genocidal, dictator, militiaman, vulgar, misogynistic, demonic, heartless, disgusting, liar person is in charge of the most important decisions in my country is terrifying. 
It is terrifying to wake up to another criminal, unfair and unjustifiable death. 
It is terrifying to see science, social goods, education, health, culture, well-being, human rights and the environment being deemed as not a priority.
It is terrifying to see so many people drawing pleasure from wishing harm. Family members hating each other. Friends being set apart. General confusion, misinformation, lack of reason, inequality, hunger, despair. 
It is terrifying to go sleep with the echo of “death is also discharging” accompanied by over 600.000 asphyxiated voices.
It is a constant waking up into a nightmare. 
This must end.
Enough. 
The country is wounded and sick, it is time for healing.

#forabolsonaro

A minimum of 50% of primary sales from this piece will be used to support Brazilian artists.

•I have been avoiding creating images that depict a future or a present I don’t wish to create. Therefore for this Halloween, I made something that represents terror but also pictures something I wish to see.•
